Author Class

Code for creating ORM Class

class solution.create_classes.library_schema.author.Author(name)[source]

Author class docstring

Variables

  • pk_id (int) – pk_id

  • name (str) – name

  • created_by (str) – user name of creator

  • created_on (datetime.datetime) – timestamp while creating

  • last_updated_by (str) – user name of updater

  • last_updated_on (datetime.datetime) – timestamp while updating

  • is_active (bool) – active status
